flawed_nl_solution:
Fiona earns 40 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<40*20=800>>800/week
So she earns $800/week * 4 weeks/month = $3200/month
John earns 30 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<30*20=6000>>6000/week
So he earns $6000/week * 4 weeks/month = $<<6000*4=24000>>24000/month
Jeremy earns 25 hours * $20/hour = $<<25*20=500>>500/week
So he earns $500/week * 4 weeks/month = $2000/month
Overall their boss has to spend $3200/month + $24000/month + $2000/month = $<<3200+24000+2000=29200>>29200/month
#### 29200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
